entries.message: Where is the configuration for this project defined?
The `config/` folder is present but empty; no config files or environment-variable usage found. Suggested adding a sample config or documenting where config should live.
Added pytest tests and a GitHub Actions workflow to validate the loader.
Added Pydantic schema and validation; updated loader and tests.
Which should I do next? — bet one
Replaced `.dict()` with `.model_dump()` to remove deprecation warnings.
Added stronger validation (IP, URL, allowed log levels), tests, and docs; all tests passed.
Implemented `scripts/cli.py` with `validate` and `export-schema`, added tests and CI step.
For chat history keep from codespces i want to create a file help me on this the file name is chat_history_codespces
Created `chat_history_codespces` at repo root; asked whether to commit and/or change format.
yes do the best Next steps
Committed and pushed chat history files (md/json) and added a docs link.
